ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast  Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine heard the concern in her voice, he understood, if he had a choice he wouldn t be going after Megatron either, but he knew that there was a chance,

Lunarpine heard the concern in her voice, he understood, if he had a 
choice he wouldn't be going after Megatron either, but he knew that 
there was a chance, him, ripper, and ramhorn could handle the 
situation.

"Do me right Wing, keep  my back safe."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She listened to him yell at her. "OK, OK, I get the hint. I'll head 
> skyward and keep an eye out." She could have slapped herself for 
the 
> use of that word. She knew he was just looking out for her, but she 
> wanted to look out for him as well.  She flew up into a high branch 
> of a tree and looked about.  She didn't see anything, other than 
the 
> Maximals outside the Ark. She opened her comlink and whispered to 
> him,"You be careful down there." She didn't want to make him mad. 
But 
> she was worried for him. "I can't see any preds yet. Not from here. 
> Let take a better look."  She flew out and flew in circles over the 
> Ark and the surrounding landscape.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "DON'T EVEN THINK IT!" This was not the time for sarcasm.
> > 
> > Lunarpine reached the end of the forrest and paused in case Megs 
> had 
> > arranged backup. He smelled the air if there were preds nearby 
he'd 
> > smell them. Nothing in the air so he transformed to bot and crept 
> his 
> > way towards the entrance.
> > 
> > "Ramhorn what's your location?"
> > 
> > He looked over toward Shadow Wing,"Stay out here where it's..." 
He 
> > wanted to say "Safe" But didn't want to patronize her."Where you 
> and 
> > these three can provide coverfire if more pests show up."
> >
